roleset.name: to give or offer to give voluntarily

example.name: autogen2
example.text: `` volunteers '' planting trees , emptying bedpans , tutoring children , and assisting librarians for $ 100 a week , tax free , plus medical care
example.arg: planting trees , emptying bedpans , tutoring children , and assisting librarians for $ 100 a week , tax free , plus medical care
